desserts.name: VELVET DREAM CAKE
desserts.describe: A rich red velvet cake layered with creamy vanilla bean frosting and topped with edible gold flakes. Each slice melts in your mouth, leaving a hint of cocoa and a touch of luxury.

desserts.name: SPICED CHAIN CHEESECAKE
desserts.describe: A creamy cheesecake infused with warm chai spices, set on a ginger snap crust. Finished with a dollop of whipped cream and a sprinkle of cinnamon for a cozy flavor experience.

desserts.name: CHOCOLATE LAVA DELIGHT
desserts.describe: A decadent chocolate cake with a molten center that flows like lava when cut. Served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and drizzled with rich chocolate sauce.

desserts.name: BERRY PARADISE PARFAIT
desserts.describe: Layers of fresh mixed berries, creamy Greek yogurt, and crunchy granola, all beautifully presented in a glass. Topped with a drizzle of honey and a sprig of mint for a refreshing treat.

desserts.name: CITRUS BLISS TART
desserts.describe: A zesty lemon and orange tart with a buttery shortcrust pastry, filled with a smooth citrus curd. Finished with a light dusting of powdered sugar and candied citrus peels for an extra burst of flavor.
